data.message:
Good move..
But where was this dp when 150 kids were massacared in Peshawar ?

replies.message: True. Why didnt FB changed their logo when taliban brutally killed 150 children in APS Peshawar Pakistan?? No diacrimination we all are human being. That incident was more dangerous than this incident. Bcz terrorist targets were innocent kids
A lot of things don't get put on the news. So if it's not on the news, how are we supposed to know? But it's terrible that happened
Woo u didn't see the news peshawer atk...ok then we didn't see the news in paris atk...
I like your family name, Michele Felicia Schneider
Michele Felicia Schneider Media is selective when it comes to coverage of such disasters. Just 2 days ago 50 died in Lebanon but it never received such coverage.
26/11 perpetrators Lakhwi and Hafiz Saeed roam free in Pakistan. Maybe you should question Nawaz Sharif about this first..
Karim that's what I'm saying. As I asked before if it doesn't get put in the news how are we supposed to know.

can you explain why there is massacres of muslims by fellow muslims??? can you explain why there are virtually weekly bombings in Pakistan outside a shi'ite mosque by sunni muslims and vice versa??? is it the French??????

AND its usually following friday prayers!!!! 
Suppose its the French again is it?

Peshawer attack somewhere connects indirectly with 9/11 #Garret. Pakistan is ally of US in SA region in war against terror. So after hatered grew up among taliban and they did it with our kids. The APS Attack Peshawar and that was worst
#Rajnath you are indian troller and you will speak illogical n baseless. This is totally wrong. Who said u this?? U indians talk rubbish in the morning whatever u see in dreams

im not indian.... im BRITISH  and I hold a BRITISH PASSPORT something you will do ANYTHING for... you will sell your land, sell your property sell everything to illegally enter the UK  and try and obtain a British Passport for! 
I speak the truth.... shi'ite fight sunnis.... how can you ever get peace if you are fighting amongst each other! and then you blame the USA!!!! You're a comedian
